history.text: Hello?
Hi, the movie is the avengers from 2012
Sounds great! Who starred in the movie?
It stars robert downey jr as tony stark/iron man. And chris hemsworth as thor. With a rating of 92% on rotten tomatoes, it's a movie you should see
That sounds like it's really good. Is this a sequel?
Cinemascore also gave it a A+. Some critics call is formulaic and familiar but Joss Whedon was able to stir all the personalities and make it tasty again
That's great. Did Joss Whedon direct it as well?
I don't know anything about a sequel only the 2012 The Vengers movie. Yes Joss Whedon is the director.
Any idea how much it made in the box office?
It's part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe, the 6th film. And it was distributed by Walt Disny Studio Motion Pictures.
No, I don't know how much it made at the box office. But it has a powerful energy source called the Tesseract in it.
What month in 2012 did it release?
I don't know the month, just that it was released in 2012.
Gotcha. Sounds like a really great movie.
It has Thor's brother Loki who is trying to subjugate the earth with an army.
Who is Loki played by?
I don't know the actor that plays Loki.
Is Hulk in it?
But I can tell you that in the movie shield wants to harness the tesserect to build weapons. And the hulk is in it. He's played by Mark Ruffalo
Are Shield basically the bad guys?
He actually transforms into the Hulk while arguing with the group.
Does Hulk fight with the group at all?

Well Shield wants to develop a weapon that acts as a deterrant to hostile extraterrestrials
.
Oh gotcha. So Shield works with the Avengers team?
When the other avengers stark, romanoff, barton, thor and roger go to defend New York City. Banner comes and transforms to the Hulk, and fights the Chitauri with them.
The hulk also beats Loki into submission.
Who is the character Stark? Which superhero is he?
While Shield wants to defend against extraterrestrials, Nick Fury's superiors want to end the Chitauri invasion by bombing Manhattan.
Stark is Tony Stark also known as Iron Man. He's played by Robert Downey Jr.
Oh nice, I love him.
Who plays Nick Fury?
In the movie stark intercepts the missile that the Fury's superiors sent, and takes it into a wormhole.
I don't know the actor that plays Nick Fury.
So Nick Fury works for Shield?
But Nick is the director of Shield.
Oh I see. How many Avengers are there exactly?
There are 6 avengers, Hawkeye, Black Widow, Thor, Iron Man, The Hulk and Captain America.
Also Shield is a peacekeeping organization.
What does Captain America do, what's his skill?
And The Avengers are recruited by Nick Fury.
I don't know Captain America's exact skills, but he does help defend New York City.
Does it all take place in New York City?
No, some of it take place at a remote research facility. Some on a Helicarrier, and Loki comes out of a wormhole.

uid2response.feedback: I felt like the movie actually sounded interesting and like a mix of sci-fi and superheroes. I will definitely give it a shot.
